archimate:WorkPackage.name: DPS Transformation Core Security Services
archimate:WorkPackage.documentation:
This is the plan to transition the core security platforms given the need to react to industry demand and the DPS Transition plan. Theres a rough plan to create new versions of UMN but we do not know how this is planned to be achieved.
Since the Security Tools and Platforms team now move away from security and compliance this poject is now discontinued from S&C - Its something DPS will need to run as its own thing that does not belong on the S&C Roadmap.

properties.value: Jukka Kuusinen (Head of Security & Compliance Finland)
